sentences.en: Go to the Wailing Ziggurat, see if he's doing okay.
sentences.cn: 去哀嚎通灵塔看看他战的如何了.

sentences.en: Only the king and priests could enter a ziggurat.
sentences.cn: 只有国王和祭司才能进入神庙内.

sentences.en: We think he went off north to the Wailing Ziggurat.
sentences.cn: 我们认为他向北去哀嚎通灵塔了.

trans.tran_cn: 古代亚述及巴比伦之金字形神塔（顶上有神殿），庙塔
trans.tran_en: an ancient Middle Eastern structure which has smaller and smaller upper levels and a temple on top
